actions.name: Multi Headed
actions.description: Effect: All of the user's Physical- and Special-Category attacks attacks without [X-Strike] cost +X PP, have their Power reduced by 15+10*X%, and gain [X-Strike] (or +X to their existing [X-Strike] value), where X is equal to value of the user's [X-Headed] Trait.

system.description: Effect: All of the user's Physical- and Special-Category attacks attacks without [X-Strike] cost +X PP, have their Power reduced by 15+10*X%, and gain [X-Strike] (or +X to their existing [X-Strike] value), where X is equal to value of the user's [X-Headed] Trait.
